question_stem:
Using the student-mat.csv dataset from our lectures, create a contingency table from the variables address and guardian. Store it as address_guardian. 
Write R code that will:

Compute the proportion of students whose home address was rural, and whose guardian was their mother. 
Estimate the probability of students whose home address was rural, and whose guardian was their mother, under the null hypothesis of the chi2-test of independence.
